participant_1.name: Mia Kim
participant_1.background: I enjoyed listening to my neighbors' conversations while I was mountain biking last year. I'm a musician who enjoys kpop and broke my nose in a fight when I was young. I like to go to the farmers market every weekend. I own a black suburban. I'm taking online classes.

participant_2.name: Ethan Lee
participant_2.background: I am not sure how much I weigh, but I am healthy and fit. I enjoy the occasional drink with friends. I'd brag about the fact that I'm still close to my friends despite all the fame. I enjoy spending time with my pets, they're always there for me when I need them. I'm allergic to cats.

content.text: I'm a musician who enjoys kpop. I broke my nose in a fight when I was young. I like going to the farmers market every weekend. I own a black suburban. I'm taking online classes.

I'm healthy and fit. I enjoy the occasional drink with friends. I'd brag about the fact that I'm still close to my friends despite all the fame. I enjoy spending time with my pets, they're always there for me when I need them. I'm allergic to cats.
What do you like to drink when you're hanging out with friends?
I enjoy a good beer or glass of wine.
What kind of music do you like to listen to when you're hanging out with friends?
I enjoy a variety of music, but I like to listen to kpop when I'm hanging out with my friends.
What do you like to do at the farmers market?
I like to buy fresh fruits and vegetables, and I also like to look at the flowers.
What do you like to do with your black suburban?
I like to go on road trips, and I also like to use it to transport my pets.
What are you taking online classes for?
I'm taking online classes to get my degree in business.
What are your goals after you graduate?
I want to start my own business.
That's great! I'm sure you'll be successful.
